Aaron Gilmore, Designer and Developer

I've spent the past year building Brewbot, a beer-brewing robot that is controlled and monitored using your iPhone. We've recently parted ways and I'm now available for freelance work.

I have experience in design for both mobile and the web, as well as front-end development.
